I hold two Masters degrees in Communication and Journalism and have expansive Project Management experience at the YWCA of Malawi.

Safe Spaces for Women

I began working with the Young Women's Christian Association of Malawi as a teen and continued on as Communications officer and Project manager, collaboration with the World YWCA to bring much needed assiatnce to women in girls in rural Malawi, Southern African and even on the world Stage in all issues that affect women from literacy, sexual reproductive health and rights to business and spiritual matters.

Smart Home, Smart Life

I worked as a journalist for 5 years for the Malawi Broadcasting Corporation as a Producer, Report and Editor for their Radio, TV and online presences. During my Masters degree studies in Global Communication and International Journalism, I interned at Reset.org and this kick-started my passion for all issues environmental.
